description: ### Access the web and mobile apps The Raven web app for Desktop is available at **/raven**. The mobile app is available at **/raven_mobile**. The mobile app is installable on your phone since it is a Progressive Web App (PWA).
name: Raven: Access the Web App
title: It's time. Send a Raven.
